details.arabic_diacless: على اللٰه توكلنا‌ ؕربنا افتح بيننا وبين قومنا بالحـق وانت خير الفٰتحين‏
details.arabic: عَلَى اللّٰهِ تَوَكَّلۡنَا‌ ؕرَبَّنَا افۡتَحۡ بَيۡنَنَا وَبَيۡنَ قَوۡمِنَا بِالۡحَـقِّ وَاَنۡتَ خَيۡرُ الۡفٰتِحِيۡنَ‏
details.transliteration: AAala Allahi tawakkalna rabbanaiftah baynana wabayna qawmina bilhaqqiwaanta khayru alfatiheen
details.translations: Upon Allah we have relied. Our Lord, decide between us and our people in truth, and You are the best of those who give decision."
